segments.text: Can you be serious for a moment , we've been dating for 6 months now , I really like you . I'd like to take a relationship to the next level .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what are you trying to say to me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It feels like you are not dedicate to our relationship . It seems like you treat it as a just casual dating .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't want to be like this . I think we should get step further .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It has only been 6 months , our relationship hasn't had a chance to maturate . We are still have some hurdle we have to jump over .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Last week I saw Brain kissing you on the cheek .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is ok , then ? Starts on the cheek ? pretty soon you french kiss in the back on his car .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So is it ok if I kiss other women on the cheek ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You see , we still have hurdle .
segments.speaker: S2
